<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[25, 16, 420, 60]]<|/det|> # Komplexe Zahlen <|ref|>table<|/ref|><|det|>[[25, 70, 621, 200]]<|/det|>
· z = x + iyarithmetische Form
· z = r (cos φ + i sin φ)trigonometrische Form
= r cis φ
r = √x² + y² = |z|
<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[25, 228, 480, 256]]<|/det|> Def: Eulers Form, Eulerische Gleichung <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[110, 268, 380, 291]]<|/det|> Für φ ∈ ℝ schreiben wir <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[160, 301, 405, 333]]<|/det|> \[e^{i\varphi} = \cos\varphi + i \cdot \sin\varphi\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[68, 365, 558, 391]]<|/det|> → für z mit r = |z| und φ = arg(z) : <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[133, 399, 300, 430]]<|/det|> \[z = r \cdot e^{i\varphi} = r \cdot e^{i(\varphi + 2k\pi)}\] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[600, 405, 675, 426]]<|/det|> \[k \in \mathbb{Z}\] <|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[160, 444, 345, 469]]<|/det|> ## Exponentialform <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[25, 501, 800, 528]]<|/det|> Bsp: · z = -2 + 2i |z| = √(-2)² + 2² = √8 = 2√2 <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[160, 536, 860, 568]]<|/det|> \[\varphi = \frac{3}{4}\pi \quad \alpha = \arctan\left(\frac{2}{2}\right) = \arctan(-1) = -\frac{\pi}{4}\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[186, 579, 508, 603]]<|/det|> → z liegt im 2. Quadratnälen <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[160, 610, 350, 642]]<|/det|> \[z = 2\sqrt{2}e^{i\frac{\pi}{4}}\] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[120, 668, 601, 780]]<|/det|> \[\begin{align*} · z &= 2e^{i\frac{\pi}{6}} \quad r &= 2, \quad \varphi = \frac{\pi}{6} \\ &= 2(\cos\frac{\pi}{6} + i \cdot \sin\frac{\pi}{6}) \\ &= 2\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} + i \cdot \frac{1}{2}\right) = \sqrt{3} + i \end{align*}\] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[120, 806, 550, 952]]<|/det|> \[\begin{align*} · z_1 &= 2e^{i\frac{\pi}{6}} \quad z_2 &= 3e^{i\frac{\pi}{4}\pi} \\ &= 2 \cdot 2e^{i\frac{\pi}{6}} e^{i\frac{\pi}{4}\pi} \\ &= 6 \cdot e^{i\left(\frac{\pi}{6} + \frac{\pi}{4}\pi\right)} = 6 \cdot e^{i\frac{3\pi}{2}} \\ &= 6 \cdot (\cos\left(\frac{3\pi}{2}\right) + i \cdot \sin\left(\frac{3\pi}{2}\right)) = -6i \end{align*}\]
